section.heading: Rules.

para.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules necessary to implement the provisions of this chapter, including:
When the requirement to modify or replace a services contract under § 32-1071.02(b)(4) shall apply;
Recordkeeping requirements for a hiring entity or a referral agency; and
Procedures for limiting the collection, retention, use, and disclosure of information related to the immigration status of individuals covered by this chapter.
